original_title: By His Wounds We Are Healed: Making 'The Passion of the Christ'
overview: A feature length documentary on the film which runs for 1 hour and 40 minutes, broken down into 21 segments. It covers a lot of ground with a tons of input from those involved - the desired goal and its impact on the filmmakers.
title: By His Wounds We Are Healed: Making 'The Passion of the Christ'
